title: Who can be called the most successful detective in the history of the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jesus Christ (c !1 BC to 31 AD) was the most successful detective in history - you can read him anticipating Sherlock Holmes in John 4:4–26 in the story of him and the Samarian woman at the well so Christ was 2,000 years ahead of his time. If you want to read about the very strong links between Christ and Sherlock Holmes, read Orlando Perason’s seminal Three Holmesian Meditation and his Adventure of the Fourth Messenger.
